name: 2 on 2 Open Ice Challenge
summary:
A four-player hockey game with 1995 NHL players and teams.

Just imagine NBA Jam, then replace basketball with hockey. You pick a team and then play for the Stanley Cup.

name: 2 of Me
summary: Defy the ancient goddess of war and free the Agency from the forces and anomalies that have captured it in this scrolling shooter and action roguelike game.
